description_for_human: This plugin allows you to interact with the Windows Event Log.
description_for_model: This API allows you to interact with the Windows Event Log. You can retrieve specific events using the XPath query language. Example 1: Retrieve all Error events from the System log by sending a GET request to 'http://localhost:5000/events?logName=System&query=*[System[(Level=2) and (Logfile='System')]]'. Example 2: Retrieve all Warning and Error events from the last 24 hours by sending a GET request to 'http://localhost:5000/events?logName=System&query=*[System[(Level<=2) and (TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 86400000])]]'. Example 3: Retrieve all events from the Application log by sending a GET request to 'http://localhost:5000/events?logName=Application&query=*[System[(Logfile='Application')]]'. Remember to replace 'http://localhost:5000' with the actual base URL of your API if it's hosted somewhere else.
